I collect interesting things I find on my couch.
i like to read.

participant_2.background:
A blue whale once swam past my boat.
I love romantic comedies, and they help me forget about my bad luck in relationships.
i enjoy jazz music.
I'm heading home after a long run to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
I love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin when I'm snorkeling.

content.text: I'm on my way home from a long run to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos. How is yours going?
I'm doing well, just got done reading a book and about to go skiing.
That sounds fun! I wish I could ski.
It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I'm more of a water person myself. I love to snorkel and swim.
I enjoy swimming too. I used to swim competitively when I was younger.
That's awesome! I've always been more of a casual swimmer, but I love it.
What kind of music do you like?
I love jazz music. It's so relaxing and easy to listen to.
I like jazz too! It's a great way to unwind after a long day.
I agree! What are some of your favorite jazz artists?
I love Miles Davis, John Coltrane, and Ella Fitzgerald.
Those are all great artists! I love Miles Davis and Ella Fitzgerald.
